vote.title: Authorize a payment in the amount of $586,867.56 to the Texas Department of Transportation (CSJ No. 0918-47-342, etc., CFDA No. 20.205) for cost overruns related to the construction of five traffic signals and associated off-system intersection improvements at: Audelia Road at Church Road, Ferguson Road at Woodmeadow Parkway, Zang Boulevard at Jefferson Boulevard, Hampton Road at Bickers Street, and Mockingbird Lane at Forest Park Road - Total amount of $586,867.56 - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund
vote.description: Authorize a payment in the amount of $586,867.56 to the Texas Department of Transportation (CSJ No. 0918-47-342, etc., CFDA No. 20.205) for cost overruns related to the construction of five traffic signals and associated off-system intersection improvements at: Audelia Road at Church Road, Ferguson Road at Woodmeadow Parkway, Zang Boulevard at Jefferson Boulevard, Hampton Road at Bickers Street, and Mockingbird Lane at Forest Park Road - Total amount of $586,867.56 - Financing: Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund
